title: Chino.1973.Charles.Bronson.DVDRip.H264.AAC-CLP
description:
<a href="http://thepiratebay.se/user/Commlinked/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://thepiratebay.se/user/Commlinked/</a>

Notes - This was ripped from a DVD, however, I did spot a watermark during part of the video. The DVD itself may have been sourced from a TV broadcast copy of the film. I couldn't find any information on the "delta" watermark, and I don't have any other source to compare quality to, so at this point I don't know if this is the best quality source for this film available or not. Regardless, it seems watchable and should be enjoyable enough for anyone who likes harder to find old movies/westerns.

==== Thank You From CLP ====

Thank you for helping with seeding. No single person can be expected to seed the same file for years. If you enjoy the upload, please "donate" by leaving it seeding so you can share it with others. ==== Movie Info ====

Chino - 1973

IMDB - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0069833/

Description - Chino Valdez is a loner horse breeder living in the old west. Partly a loner by choice, and partly because, being a 'half-breed', he finds himself unwelcome almost everywhere he goes. One day, a young runaway named Jimmy shows up at his door looking for work and a roof over his head. Reluctantly, Chino agrees to take him in and teach him the art of raising, breaking and breeding horses, until the pair finally begin to accept each other.

Notes - Original film title was "Valdez, il mezzosangue".
